raw_response.output_text:
{"image_analysis": "This is a Brazilian military personnel form from Batalhão Limeirense (Limeira Battalion) located in Limeira, State of São Paulo. The document is a physical description card with handwritten entries. The layout includes: a header with the battalion name in large bold text, followed by location subtitle. On the left side are fields for physical characteristics (height, skin color, hair color and form, beard, mustache). In the center is a blank rectangular box for a photograph. On the right side are additional physical characteristics fields (eyes, mouth, face shape, nose, identifying marks). The bottom half contains fields for name and signature, followed by signature lines for administrative officials (President of Board, Vice President, Secretary, Mayor, Delegate, Instructor). The name 'Elga Elias' is handwritten in the document. A document reference number appears in the top right corner. On the left side are fields for physical characteristics (height, skin color, hair color and form, beard, mustache). In the center is a blank rectangular box for a photograph. raw_response.output_text:
{"image_analysis": "A historical Brazilian military service record form with printed Portuguese-language field labels and handwritten cursive entries. The document is a personnel information sheet containing fields for: name, parents' names, birth information, birthplace, municipality, occupation, marital status, vaccination information (including literacy and arithmetic skills), and skills assessment (swimming, cycling, motorcycling, etc.). The residence address and observations fields are also present. Handwritten entries in cursive script fill several fields with personal and biographical data. A signature or notation appears at the bottom of the visible portion reading 'Cruz Vermelha' (Red Cross). No page numbers or footnotes are visible on this page.
